SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAlphabetView
The AddAlphabetView class is responsible for managing the view to add a new alphabet in the presentation layer.
AddKeyboardView
The AddKeyboardView class represents a view for adding a new keyboard.
AddTextView
The AddTextView class represents the view for adding a text matrix to the specified alphabet in the transition controller.
AddWordFrequencyListView
The AddWordFrequencyListView class represents the view for adding a word frequency list matrix to the specified alphabet in the transition controller.
AlgorithmController
AlgorithmController is responsible for the creation of Keyboard distributions, given a TransitionMatrix and a chosen available algorithm.
Alphabet
Represents an alphabet containing a set of unique characters identified by a key.
AlphabetListView
The AlphabetListView class is responsible for managing the alphabet list view in the presentation layer.
AlphabetsController
The AlphabetsController class manages operations related to alphabets, providing methods for retrieving, creating, deleting, and modifying alphabets using a CSVController for data persistence.
AlphabetTest
The AlphabetTest class contains JUnit test cases for the Alphabet class.
AlphabetUsed
The `AlphabetUsed` class represents an exception indicating that a specific alphabet has already been used.
ContainsKey
The `ContainsKey` class represents an exception indicating that a specific key is already present.
CSVController
The CSVController class manages operations related to reading from and writing to CSV files.
DeleteAlphabetView
The DeleteAlphabetView class is responsible for managing the view to delete an alphabet in the presentation layer.
DeleteKeyboardView
The DeleteKeyboardView class represents a view for deleting an existing keyboard.
DeleteTransitionView
The DeleteTransitionView class represents the view for deleting a transition matrix from the transition controller.
DisplayKeyboardView
The `DisplayKeyboardView` class represents a view for displaying the distribution of characters on a keyboard and allows users to interact with it.
DomainController
The DomainController class acts as a controller for the domain layer, managing interactions between input handling, keyboard operations, and other domain-related functionalities.
DriverTest
 
Error
The `Error` class represents a simple error message panel.
EvaluationView
The `EvaluationView` class is responsible for managing the keyboard evaluation view in the presentation layer.
FileNotDeleted
The `FileNotDeleted` class represents an exception indicating that a file could not be deleted.
GreedyAlgorithm
The GreedyAlgorithm class implements a greedy algorithm to determine the positions of the characters on a keyboard based on the given transit table.
GreedyAlgorithmTest
Test class for the GreedyAlgorithm class.
IncorrectAlphabetType
The `IncorrectAlphabetType` class represents an exception indicating that an incorrect alphabet type is encountered.
IncorrectType
The `IncorrectType` class represents an exception indicating that an incorrect type is encountered.
InputController
The InputController class manages the creation and manipulation of Alphabets and TransitionMatrices.
InputView
The InputView class is responsible for managing the main input view in the presentation layer.
InputViewController
The InputViewController class is responsible for managing the input view in the presentation layer.
Keyboard
The Keyboard class represents a keyboard, with its unique key and a distribution of characters.
KeyboardAvaluator
The KeyboardAvaluator class provides a method to evaluate the layout of characters on a Keyboard based on their positions and a TransitionMatrix.
KeyboardAvaluatorTest
Test class for the KeyboardAvaluator class.
KeyboardController
The KeyboardController class manages the creation, deletion, modification, consultation and evaluation of keyboards.
KeyboardList
The `KeyboardList` class represents a view for displaying a list of keyboards, allowing users to interact with keyboard entries, add new keyboards, and delete existing ones.
KeyboardsController
The KeyboardsController class manages operations related to keyboards, including creating, retrieving, modifying, and deleting keyboards through CSV files.
KeyboardTest
The KeyboardTest class contains JUnit test cases for the Keyboard class.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
MainViewController
The MainViewController class is responsible for managing the main display frame and interacting with the PresentationController to handle user input and actions.
MenuView
The MenuView class represents a view for the main menu of the application.
NotContainsKey
The `NotContainsKey` class represents an exception indicating that a specified key is not found.
OperationCorrect
The OperationCorrect class represents a simple panel indicating a successful operation.
Pair<Type1,Type2>
The Pair class represents a simple data structure that holds two values of different types.
PersistenceController
The PersistenceController class manages the persistence of keyboards, alphabets, and transition matrices, providing methods for creating, retrieving, deleting, and modifying these entities.
PresentationController
The PresentationController class is responsible for managing the presentation layer of the application.
QAPAlgorithm
QAPAlgorithm implements an algorithm based on the Quadratic Assignment Problem (QAP), used to create a Keyboard.
QAPAlgorithmController
The QAPAlgorithmController class manages the interaction between the GreedyAlgorithm and QAPAlgorithm for obtaining the positions of characters on a keyboard using the Quadratic Assignment Problem (QAP) algorithm.
QAPAlgorithmTest
Test class for the QAPAlgorithm class.
QAPPartialSolution
Represents a possible solution by the QAP Algorithm for the creation of a Keyboard.
QAPPartialSolutionTest
Test class for the QAPPartialSolution class.
StringNotInAlphabet
Exception thrown when a string does not conform to the expected alphabet.
Text
The Text class represents a form of TransitionMatrix generated from an input text by associating transitions between characters with their frequencies.
TextTest
The TextTest class contains JUnit test cases for the Text class.
TransitionMatrix
Represents a Transition Matrix associated with an Alphabet for a specific key.
TransitionMatrixTest
The TransitionMatrixTest class contains JUnit test cases for the TransitionMatrix class.
TransitionsController
The TransitionsController class acts as a controller for managing transitions between states, handling the creation, retrieval, and deletion of transition matrices.
TransitionViewController
The TransitionViewController class is responsible for managing transitions in the presentation layer.
TransView
The TransView class is responsible for managing the transition matrix view in the presentation layer.
WordFrequencyList
The WordFrequencyList class represents a specialized form of TransitionMatrix that associates word frequencies with transitions between characters in an Alphabet.
WordFrequencyListTest
The WordFrequencyListTest class is a JUnit test class for testing the functionality of the WordFrequencyList class.
